description:
About Us：

NBCN is the #1 US LIVE agency with more than 4,000 creators and working with some of the top brands on TikTok like Coca-Cola, Cider, Brookstone, Zimba, Dreo, etc.. You can know more about us through our website: https://www.nbcn.live/. We are excited that you are ready to join and make more than $10,000 a month like our top performers!


Responsibilities:

  • Product Procurement and Selection: Source and curate a diverse range of products for online platforms, ensuring alignment with market trends and customer preferences.
  • Vendor Management: Establish and maintain relationships with suppliers and vendors to negotiate terms, secure competitive pricing, and ensure timely delivery of products.
  • Social Media Integration: Collaborate with marketing teams to strategically showcase products on social media channels, leveraging trends and consumer insights to drive sales.
  • Market Analysis: Conduct market research and analyze data to identify opportunities for product expansion and optimization of inventory.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in business, marketing, or related fields.
  • Proven experience as a buyer in e-commerce or retail industries.
  • Strong negotiation and communication skills with the ability to build effective vendor relationships.
  • Proficiency in analyzing market trends and consumer behavior to inform buying decisions.
  • Strategic thinker with a results-oriented approach to achieving sales and revenue targets.


Salary

  • hourly fixed fee ($30-$45/hour）+ performance based bonus
  • Full time/ part time/ internships are both available


Benefits：

  • Learning and working with the top teams in the Live business
  • Flexible schedule
  • Competitive salary
  • Employee snacks and drinks
  • Pet friendly environment
